H0.text: What word is given to a point in tennis which has to be replayed. Fault

H1.text: What word is given to a point in tennis which has to be replayed. Replay

H2.text: What word is given to a point in tennis which has to be replayed. Obstruction

H3.text: What word is given to a point in tennis which has to be replayed. Let

A4.text: If the second service, after a fault, is also a fault, the server double faults, and the receiver wins the point.
